pull.title: test: fix script_p2sh_tests OP_PUSHBACK2/4 missing
pull.body: Cleans up #15140 which fixes commit 6b25f29a91 where opcodes were lost in translation.

Fixes commit 6b25f29a91 where opcodes where lost in translation.

issue.title: Bitcoin PR tracking
issue.body: The main purpose of this issue is to keep track of Pull Requests on Bitcoin since version 0.19.1 identifying those which make a porting LitecoinZ.

issue.title: test: Update script_p2sh_tests from upstream
issue.body:
- Clean up includes, add copyright header
- Remove namespace declaration
- tests: Test for expected return values when calling functions returning a success code
  Ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14935

- tests: Use std::vector API for construction of test data
  Ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15099

- test: fix script_p2sh_tests OP_PUSHBACK2/4 missing
  Ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17254
